# CAM::STOP_GAMEPLAY_CAM_SHAKING

## Summary
Stop the gameplay camera shaking

## Parameters
* **BOOL** stopImmediately = false: If TRUE, the shake will stop immediately, otherwise it will enter its release phase and fade out.
